digitalProducts.title: 1. Digital Products
digitalProducts.description1: Due to the nature of digital products (PDF sheet music, Audio files),
digitalProducts.emphasis: all sales are considered final and non-refundable
digitalProducts.description2: once the download link has been provided to you.

exceptions.title: 2. Exceptions
exceptions.description: We may offer a refund or replacement at our sole discretion if:

items.item1: The file you downloaded is corrupted or technically defective.
items.item2: The content of the file does not match the product description.
items.item3: You have not downloaded the file yet and wish to cancel the order within 14 days of purchase.

request.description: If you believe you qualify for a refund based on the exceptions above, please contact us at
